title: Lead UI Developer
description: Working on a greenfield project for Phillips Connect to create a ReactJs Tracking and managing fleets and devices using AWS location services and MapboxGL leveraging aws sdk & cdk for cognito and appsync configuration.
roles: Develop Nextjs pages and backend api using next connect on Nodejs Implement internationalization/localization Nextjs
Develop core components and publish them as nodejs packages. Develop api using nodejs.
Responsive web application development for cross device compatibility using tailwind. Quick Proof-of-concept prototypes.
